programme.title: Greg Davies: Firing Cheeseballs at a Dog
programme.desc: Can a chance encounter with a stray Spanish dog and a bag of crisps lead to an epiphany and a fresh approach to life? Of course it cant, but is that a reason not to build an entire show around it? This show is the first to ever attempt to chronicle an entire life without offering even the slightest insight into the human condition, every significant incident forensically removed to leave only the lean meat of the trivial.

Jessica discovers that the sisters hotel was actually a house of ill repute, and that her friends own life is in danger.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote

programme.title: Great British Ships
programme.sub-title: The Mary Rose: Secrets From the Deep
programme.desc: The Mary Rose, Henry VIIIs great warship, went down nearly five centuries ago, killing more than 400 men. A host of theories have emerged to explain the disaster, including enemy fire, the ships builders, an unruly crew, and even the King himself.

programme.title: Great British Ships

programme.title: World War II in Colour

programme.title: The Dambusters

programme.title: The Dambusters

programme.title: The Dambusters

programme.desc: Ross is shocked by recent events, Okie finds a new way to manipulate a situation, and Elaine reveals her big plans to Yolande.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Ravi steps up for his family, Nigel accidentally offends, and Elaine gives Johnny food for thought.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Ross struggles with the consequences of Joels actions. Meanwhile, Gina tries to distract herself, Oscar and Nigel join forces to see out a plan, and Johnny turns pale when he learns of his mistake.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: With the first banishment sending shockwaves throughout the castle, the Traitors dont wait long to commit their next murder. As a new day dawns, the celebrity players turn their focus to a mission that forces them to work very closely as a team under punishing conditions. But as night falls, will their teamwork continue in the Round Table and result in catching a Traitor, or will they inadvertently banish a fellow Faithful?

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by murdered and banished Players for exclusive chat. Also, Faithful Maddy and Traitor Freddie join for gameplay analysis and need-to-know Traitors intel.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the players fall deeper into the game, a new day brings new suspicions amongst the Faithful. The mission forces the celebrities to communicate in a way no-one expected, and with the murdering hour approaching, the players take their seats at the Round Table. Will the Faithful work as a team to uncover a Traitor, or will the Traitors power grow stronger?

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by the latest banished and murdered celebrity Players as theyre told the identity of the Traitors for the very first time...

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: A snowboarder battles the elements and a masked snowmobile rider whos out for blood.

programme.title: Stranded On Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: The six newlywed couples are over halfway through their adventure. But the arrival of the flare and a way out of the experience makes waves for three couples who are facing major challenges.

programme.title: Stranded On Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: The couples awaken to the aftermath of a tense Couples Cove gathering.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: An old map, mysterious clues and ancient secrets, Mojo and Bo are after the treasure of the Knights of Swoppiton! But Preston is after it too, so they need to get there first.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Searching for a vital part of the ship that was lost during their crash-landing, Cosima and Big Lizard find Dunk stuck on a beach. They use science to save the day and make a new friend.

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: Herbert takes his failed cooling hat invention along on a quest,using it to save the day after being faced with the Riddlemasters jibes.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a sceptre adorned with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches in gold. Before long, he uses it to steal the Lemmings chocolate.

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: The Series
programme.sub-title: Sparkle! The Glow of Flame and Art!
programme.desc: Roys first Tera training test pits him against a familiar face - gym leader Brassius!

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: The Bros go back to school as undercover teachers but have to do as the other says! Luckily, Glow Up Star Axel is there to help disguise the Bros as Mr Longgrass and Mr Pickles.

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
programme.desc: Giant is pranked by Nitro when he appears as a guest of honour at a fake school award ceremony! The other Gladiators have sneaky fun backstage at Sheffield Arena.

programme.title: Blue Peter
programme.sub-title: Bros in Control, Pranks and What Really Happens at the Airport!
programme.desc: Adam B, Callum B and Joe Tasker take on Blue Peter presenters in three bonkers battles.

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: News magazine keeping young viewers up to date with the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

programme.title: Deadly Predators
programme.desc: Steve goes in search of the fastest Deadly Predators on earth. Using the latest CGI, Steve high-dives off a rugged cliff in Wales next to a gannet, tests the speed and accuracy of a gannet dive in a sky-high experiment in his deadly junkyard using a crane and an old caravan, and takes to the kayak for an amazing animal encounter with thousands of wild gannets.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: Guru Nanak Darbar Gurdwara, the Sikh temple in Gravesend, welcomes us for their daily morning service, including the culmination of a 48-hour continuous prayer, the Akhand Paath.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Horticulturists offer various techniques to elevate the home gardening experience, from repositioning roses in rustic layouts to planning vibrant spring displays.

programme.title: This Farming Life
programme.desc: A new family, dairy farmers the McLeans, are introduced. Raymond goes the extra mile to save his lambs. Stevie faces buffalo cow number 666, and Kirsty and Aimee take last years calves to market.

programme.title: Kelvins Big Farming Adventure
programme.desc: Rookie farmers Kelvin Fletcher and his wife Liz buy their first livestock, a flock of rare breed Cotswold sheep. Its shearing season, and Kelvin wants to find out if he can make a quick return on his investment by selling their fleeces.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Bakeation
programme.desc: Si and Dave bake a classic focaccia with rosemary by the side of an Italian Canal. Its not long before they are back on the road again, making a dash for Turin to help celebrate Italys 150th Birthday. In between, they cook a stromboli.

programme.title: Now, Voyager
programme.desc: A repressed spinsters struggles to break free from her overbearing mother and assert her independence. On the advice of a skilled psychiatrist, she embarks on a cruise, during which she finds love and self-esteem for the first time in her life. However, her new-found confidence is shaken when it is revealed her beau is a married man.

programme.title: Dark Victory
programme.desc: A socialite who learns shes dying of a brain tumour decides to squeeze a lifetime of living into one glorious summer.

programme.title: Animal Babies: First Year on Earth
programme.desc: From around three months old, the animal babies can all get around on their own, but that means the impact of their environment and the struggle to find food really begin to hit home. In California, a three-month old sea otter pup has to learn whats safe to eat in a world enmeshed with humans.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Members of the public are invited to try to make money out of their antiques.

programme.title: What Are UFOs?
programme.desc: Astrophysicists and engineers look at evidence that supports the existence of UFOs.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Steven Spielbergs science fiction classic tells the story of an engineer who observes UFOs over Indiana and, along with hundreds of others, is drawn inexplicably to a remote mountain where scientists plan to make contact with the alien visitors. This version is the re-edited directors cut, featuring previously unseen footage.

programme.title: 40 Hits of 1985 at the BBC
programme.desc: A trip into the BBCs archives for a selection of songs from 1985, including Elton John, Duran Duran, Foreigner, Billy Ocean, Marillion, Go West, Strawberry Switchblade and Kirsty MacColl.

programme.title: The Story of Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: The story behind the epic Queen single, featuring a return to Rockfield Studios by Brian May and Roger Taylor where they re-record the guitar and drum parts and explain how the song came together. Featuring exclusive rare recordings of Freddie Mercury performing the song in the studio, Queens first TV performance, the making of the video and interviews with Mercurys friends and family.

programme.title: Queen: The Legendary 1975 Concert
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve 1975, Queen crowned a glorious year with a special concert at Londons Hammersmith Odeon. This final night of their triumphant UK tour has become a legendary event in Queens history. Featuring stunning renditions of early hits `Keep Yourself Alive, `Liar and `Now Im Here alongside Brian Mays epic `Brighton Rock and a rip-roaring version of the classic `Bohemian Rhapsody.

programme.title: Queen at the BBC
programme.desc: A trip through the archives that serves up an hour of killer Queen material, featuring some of the bands greatest musical moments ever delivered to our screens. The legendary bands huge international status and punishing touring schedules meant that over the years they made surprisingly few appearances on programmes like `Top of the Pops, and tragically for their fans, several of those performances were either lost or never recorded.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: For three police recruits in Belfast, the pressure is immense. Facing criminal gangs and divided communities, they dont know who to trust.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Services critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

Elsewhere, Daphne wonders aloud if she and Niles will ever be able to declare their love and is further demoralised when Mel shows up at Frasiers party, forcing Niles to play along as her dutiful husband.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier begins to suspect his attractive new attorney is unfairly running up his bill, and hotshot lawyer Donny agrees to drop the suit when he falls in love with another woman he intends to marry, but Daphne might not be able to leave well enough alone.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Barney are recruited by NASA to make it more appealing to the man in the street, and when Barney falls off the wagon, Homer is chosen to go into space.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer decides to become Flanders new best friend after attending a football game with him.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.sub-title: United States Grand Prix: Sprint Qualifying
programme.desc: The fourth sprint race of the season kicks off in the USA as the drivers fight for those all-important bonus championship points. Wholl make it to pole?

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off in Lincolnshire, where hosts Ryan and Hollie have a unique style and 15,000 mannequins up their sleeves.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Mum and daughter Holly and Meg host the weeks second visit at their Nottinghamshire glampsite, where they aim to make glamping even more glam.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: In Richmond in North Yorkshire, Toms already let all his competitors know his place is the best in town. So whys he feeling so hard done by at feedback time?

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Brittany hosts the weeks final visit in Windermere, where the BandBers enjoy an arty afternoon. But faces drop when it comes to the cost.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its been a fiery week, and every last one of the BandBers is unhappy with their feedback. So expect more fireworks when they meet up once again to find out whos won.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: A couple turn an army lorry and an old caravan into an off-roader. A man builds a luxury cabin on his familys farm. Plus: George checks out a skip thats been turned into a home.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In London and Sussex, Phil catches up with Robin and Colin, who only had eyes for an architectural gem, and Lia and Andrew, who were done with renting and wanted their own home.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: In Newtownards, Amy and Brian are at loggerheads over their five-bed chalet bungalow. Can Kirstie make it feel like new again, or will the grass be greener elsewhere? (S8 Ep1)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: In 2013, Jon and Noreen planned to build a treehouse in Gloucestershire. By 2016, money had run out and the house was barely ready to move into.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: Bettany Hughes Treasures of the World
programme.desc: From Samarkand and the heart of the silk road, Bettany journeys through Uzbekistan, uncovering new finds and encountering sun worship and Zoroastrian funeral rites.

programme.title: Great British Train Journeys From Above
programme.desc: In Wales, the Mountain Spirit traverses glorious coastlines and ancient oak woodlands on the Ffestiniog Railway, through the mountainous Snowdonia National Park.

programme.title: The Menu
programme.desc: Shocking surprises await a couple when they travel to a coastal island to sample a chefs lavish menu at an exclusive restaurant.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: On June 4, 1942, the Japanese navy plans a strike against American ships in the Pacific. For the next three days, the U.S. Navy and a squad of brave fighter pilots engage the enemy in one of the most important and decisive battles of World War II.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.sub-title: United States Grand Prix: Sprint and Qualifying
programme.desc: The drivers take on the Sprint race before focusing on GP Qualis. Its a day of high intensity, bold strategy, and edge-of-the-seat drama from start to finish.

programme.title: Iris Prize Best British Shorts 2025
programme.desc: Channel 4 broadcasts a compilation of the prestigious Iris Prize LGBTQ+ Film Festival 2025 shortlist - including the winner - with all titles also available to stream on Channel 4.

programme.title: Iris Prize Best British Shorts 2025
programme.desc: Channel 4 broadcasts a compilation of the prestigious Iris Prize LGBTQ+ Film Festival 2025 shortlist - including the winner - with all titles also available to stream on Channel 4.

programme.title: Kambakkht Ishq
programme.desc: In Hollywood, a chauvinistic stuntman and a glamorous surgeon and sometime model share a love-hate relationship.

programme.title: Hello Brother
programme.desc: A heart transplant links a police officer with a restless spirit out for revenge against the man who murdered him.

programme.title: Swades
programme.desc: Mohan Bhargava is a successful NRI (non-resident Indian) working at the technological forefront of NASA in the USA. Driven by nostalgia, he returns to his roots to find the nanny who raised him in his homeland, intending to bring her back to America. His journey leads him into the rural heart of India, to the village of Charanpur, and sets him on both an outward and inner quest to find where he truly belongs.

programme.title: Dil
programme.desc: A man pretends to be a rich industrialist to improve his sons chances of marrying into wealth, but his plan backfires on him.

programme.title: Student of the Year 2
programme.desc: A man follows his lover to St Teresas college hoping to reunite with her. There, he befriends the most popular student who is constantly in disagreement with his sister.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Rajkumar, an aimless youth, works for a drug baron and is sent to kill a rival dealer. His life is changed forever when he meets Chanda, and has no idea she is the adopted daughter of the man he is supposed to kill.

programme.title: Chhaava
programme.desc: Shivajis death sparks the Maratha-Mughal conflict. His son Sambhaji leads resistance against Aurangzebs forces. Amid battles and intrigue, both sides face challenges in a struggle for power.

programme.title: Gehraiyaan
programme.desc: A woman finds herself at a crossroads in life. Her six year relationship has grown monotonous and her career seems to have hit a roadblock. However, the arrival of her cousin forces her to confront a troubled past.

programme.title: Toh Baat Pakki
programme.desc: When Civil Engineering student Rahul Saxena finds a new place to live he did not count on finding the love of his life as well.

programme.desc: Featuring music from Irish rockers Snow Patrol and stand-up from Kerry Godliman. Also, presenter Alan Carr bravely hands his phone over, and `Greatest Dancer judge Oti Mabuse and TV presenter Anthea Turner join Michael to play the Midnight Gameshow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fertility Test
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler have an embarrassing encounter with an old acquaintance at a fertility clinic, Ross plays Cyrano to help Joey woo a professor, and Rachel sneaks into a spa for a massage hoping Phoebe wont find out.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Disappointed to learn that they cannot conceive a baby naturally, Monica and Chandler consider their options. When Chandler invites a handsome colleague round for dinner, Monica and Chandler embarrassingly interview him as a potential sperm donor. Meanwhile, while shopping with Phoebe, Rachel admits that she still has a thing for Joey.

programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Featuring music from Irish rockers Snow Patrol and stand-up from Kerry Godliman. Also, presenter Alan Carr bravely hands his phone over, and `Greatest Dancer judge Oti Mabuse and TV presenter Anthea Turner join Michael to play the Midnight Gameshow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss New Girlfriend
programme.desc: Ross comes back from China with his new girlfriend Julie, and Rachel has a really hard time dealing with it. She winds up sleeping with Paolo and hates herself for it. Joey persuades her to tell Ross how she feels, but when Ross tells her he is in love with Julie, she cant bring herself to do it.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Breast Milk
programme.desc: While Carol and Susan are away, Ross and the friends babysit his newborn son Ben, but Ross is disgusted when Phoebe tests the temperature of some bottled breast milk on her wrist. Meanwhile, Joey competes with a fellow cologne salesman.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When downstairs neighbour Mr Heckles dies, the friends clean out his apartment, but Chandler becomes convinced his hyper-critical nature will mean he ends up alone and sad, just like Heckles.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is surprised when Phoebes husband - a gay Canadian ice dancer - shows up, as nobody knew she was married. Elsewhere, Chandler reveals his third nipple, and Ross new relationship is under attack, unbeknown to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Five Steaks and an Eggplant
programme.desc: Monica gets promoted and invites the friends out for dinner to celebrate, but problems arise when the difference in their salaries becomes apparent and the group splits in two. Meanwhile, when Chandler sets a woman up to get a date with her, a case of mistaken identities means that he discovers what she really thought of him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Baby on the Bus
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler babysit Ben, who turns out to be a babe-magnet until they accidentally leave him on a bus. Meanwhile, Phoebe loses her job as the singer at Central Perk to Stephanie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
programme.desc: Ross and Julie announce they are getting a cat together, while Rachel gets drunk on a date and all she talks about is Ross. She decides to get closure by calling him and telling his machine she is over him. Meanwhile, Chandler regrets asking Monica to help him lose weight.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross agonises over whether he should stay with Julie or date Rachel. The gang encourage him to compare the two, so he starts with a list of Rachels negative qualities. Unfortunately, Rachel sees the list.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey gets a great acting opportunity on `Days of our Lives, Rachel dates a guy called Russ who is amazingly similar to Ross, and Monica renews her relationship with `Fun Bobby, but finds out Bobby is only fun when he is drinking.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Lesbian Wedding
programme.desc: Rachels free-spirited mother visits and reveals that she wants to end her marriage and experiment sexually. Meanwhile, Carol and Susan prepare for their wedding, with some help from an uncomfortable Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Joey starts dating a fan who is gorgeous, but soon discovers that shes also quite mad. Meanwhile, Ross is reminded how much he misses Marcel his old pet monkey, and travels to San Diego Zoo to find out what has happened to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Ross finally spends some time with Marcel after many false starts, and Chandler is delighted to get a date with the sexy Susie, who he hasnt seen since fourth grade. However, she gets her revenge for youthful humiliation by leaving him in the loo, naked but for a pair of her knickers.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Prom Video
programme.desc: When Monicas parents clear out her old room to install a gym, they unearth an old video of her and Rachels first prom night. Its obvious from this that Ross is in love with Rachel and, having told him it will never happen, Rachel changes her mind. Elsewhere, Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a token of his friendship and is mortally offended to hear Chandler saying how terrible it is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel ... You Know
programme.desc: Among the guests at Monicas party is a handsome and sophisticated doctor, but the only problem is that hes old enough to be her father. Meanwhile, Joey buys a big screen TV and two reclining leather armchairs with the money from his `Days of Our Lives contract.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
programme.desc: Everyone at Monicas dads birthday party finds it amusing that their middle-aged friend, eye-doctor Richard Burke, is dating a woman in her 20s - until Monicas parents learn that it is their daughter. Meanwhile, Chandler and Joey row over a dirty spoon. Is the apartment still big enough for both of them?

programme.title: St Trinians 2: The Legend of Frittons Gold
programme.desc: The boarding schools anarchic female students discover newly appointed head girl Annabelle Fritton had a 16-century nautical ancestor who acquired a rather large treasure trove on the high seas. The girls have one of the keys to finding its location, but also determinedly on trail of the Spanish loot is the devious and amoral Sir Piers Pomfrey, who is not alone in his desire to stop them.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Featuring music from Irish rockers Snow Patrol and stand-up from Kerry Godliman. Also, presenter Alan Carr bravely hands his phone over, and `Greatest Dancer judge Oti Mabuse and TV presenter Anthea Turner join Michael to play the Midnight Gameshow.

programme.title: Michael McIntyre: Hello Wembley!
programme.desc: Stand-up performance recorded at Wembley Arena during Michael McIntyres 2009 sell-out 54 date UK tour. The show features Michaels unique take on life - from getting to grips with wine menus and restaurant etiquette, to obsessive Wii playing and condiment hierarchy in the kitchen cupboard.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Joining Stan, Kyle, Eric and Kenny down in South Park for a dose of crude language and dark, surreal humour.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: Melvin Udall is an obsessive-compulsive writer of romantic fiction whos rude to everyone he meets, including his gay neighbour Simon, but when he has to look after Simons dog, he begins to soften and, if still not completely over his problems, finds he can conduct a relationship with the only waitress at the local diner wholl serve him.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams to rip into embarrassing TikToks, confusing challenges and painfully awkward posts. (S1, E07)

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Enjoy another dose of improv chaos, incl. Weird Newscasters with grouchy grandma Gary, Ryan reviewing great human inventions, and Wayne presenting the weather as a rock opera.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Gary plays a Hollywood Director, trying to marshal the cast through an Indiana Jones style scene.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Butt-Head blows off Beaviss ear and tries to reattach it. Beavis and Butt-Head think Beavis has died and is now a ghost.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey gets a great acting opportunity on `Days of our Lives, Rachel dates a guy called Russ who is amazingly similar to Ross, and Monica renews her relationship with `Fun Bobby, but finds out Bobby is only fun when he is drinking.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Lesbian Wedding
programme.desc: Rachels free-spirited mother visits and reveals that she wants to end her marriage and experiment sexually. Meanwhile, Carol and Susan prepare for their wedding, with some help from an uncomfortable Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Joey starts dating a fan who is gorgeous, but soon discovers that shes also quite mad. Meanwhile, Ross is reminded how much he misses Marcel his old pet monkey, and travels to San Diego Zoo to find out what has happened to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Ross finally spends some time with Marcel after many false starts, and Chandler is delighted to get a date with the sexy Susie, who he hasnt seen since fourth grade. However, she gets her revenge for youthful humiliation by leaving him in the loo, naked but for a pair of her knickers.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Prom Video
programme.desc: When Monicas parents clear out her old room to install a gym, they unearth an old video of her and Rachels first prom night. Its obvious from this that Ross is in love with Rachel and, having told him it will never happen, Rachel changes her mind. Elsewhere, Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a token of his friendship and is mortally offended to hear Chandler saying how terrible it is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel ... You Know
programme.desc: Among the guests at Monicas party is a handsome and sophisticated doctor, but the only problem is that hes old enough to be her father. Meanwhile, Joey buys a big screen TV and two reclining leather armchairs with the money from his `Days of Our Lives contract.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
programme.desc: Everyone at Monicas dads birthday party finds it amusing that their middle-aged friend, eye-doctor Richard Burke, is dating a woman in her 20s - until Monicas parents learn that it is their daughter. Meanwhile, Chandler and Joey row over a dirty spoon. Is the apartment still big enough for both of them?

programme.title: St Trinians 2: The Legend of Frittons Gold
programme.desc: The boarding schools anarchic female students discover newly appointed head girl Annabelle Fritton had a 16-century nautical ancestor who acquired a rather large treasure trove on the high seas. The girls have one of the keys to finding its location, but also determinedly on trail of the Spanish loot is the devious and amoral Sir Piers Pomfrey, who is not alone in his desire to stop them.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Featuring music from Irish rockers Snow Patrol and stand-up from Kerry Godliman. Also, presenter Alan Carr bravely hands his phone over, and `Greatest Dancer judge Oti Mabuse and TV presenter Anthea Turner join Michael to play the Midnight Gameshow.

programme.title: Michael McIntyre: Hello Wembley!
programme.desc: Stand-up performance recorded at Wembley Arena during Michael McIntyres 2009 sell-out 54 date UK tour. The show features Michaels unique take on life - from getting to grips with wine menus and restaurant etiquette, to obsessive Wii playing and condiment hierarchy in the kitchen cupboard.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Joining Stan, Kyle, Eric and Kenny down in South Park for a dose of crude language and dark, surreal humour.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: Melvin Udall is an obsessive-compulsive writer of romantic fiction whos rude to everyone he meets, including his gay neighbour Simon, but when he has to look after Simons dog, he begins to soften and, if still not completely over his problems, finds he can conduct a relationship with the only waitress at the local diner wholl serve him.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Maisie Adam, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Vogue Williams to rip into embarrassing TikToks, confusing challenges and painfully awkward posts. (S1, E07)

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Enjoy another dose of improv chaos, incl. Weird Newscasters with grouchy grandma Gary, Ryan reviewing great human inventions, and Wayne presenting the weather as a rock opera.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Gary plays a Hollywood Director, trying to marshal the cast through an Indiana Jones style scene.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head

programme.desc: A darkness descends on Nugget Creek as mine boss Dustin searches for a plan B, and his crew may be onto something at their new mine site. After battling bedrock for months, a breakthrough offers them the hope they need.

programme.desc: Dustin risks losing his claims as he battles equipment failure to hit bedrock and $100K in gold, while tensions between Dustin and Danielle boil over.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water

programme.desc: The delightful Ina Garten reveals her cooking tips. Ina cooks farm fresh food including scalloped tomatoes and crisp salad, and she hosts her very own question and answer session.

programme.title: Ravneet Gills Chop House
programme.desc: Aiming for the perfect lunch menu, Ravneet bakes Tottenham cake, discovers a mouthwatering chocolate tart, and Mattie makes glazed ham.

programme.title: Ravneet Gills Chop House
programme.desc: With the restaurant sign up, Mattie cooks his mums pasta, Ravneet makes trifle, and they source suppliers. But will her trifle pass the mum test?

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Whether it is sweet and sour, hot and cold or spicy and cool, the right flavour combinations can create great results. Many people dont have time to follow cookery books and Nigels unflustered style makes the dishes easy to remember without complicated recipes. He also visits local allotment holders and creates a tasty feast from the fruits of their labours.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: As the nights draw in, food writer Nigel Slater makes the kind of food that can really brighten up dark rainy evenings. Nigel creates a weeks worth of delicious meals that are simple to make. Nigel raids his cupboards, fridge and veg patch to make comfort food that hits the spot and makes staying in a real treat.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James and his wingman, top chef Mark Jordan, hop aboard their motorbikes to discover the wonderful island of Guernsey. They sample local speciality Gache cake, a seafood platter fit for a king, and James uses Guernseys wonderful dairy produce to make a delicious creamy rice pudding with chargrilled peaches. Finally, James and Mark set themselves a fishing challenge by attempting to catch the King of the Sea: the mighty turbot.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James discovers the delights of Dorset. He is joined on his trip by his mate and Michelin-starred chef Paul Ainsworth. They hop aboard a millionaires yacht, where James cooks a delicious sea bass dish. Paul discovers some fantastic local cheese, while James visits a breeder with mangalista pigs in a beautiful coastline setting. The highlight of their day is a beachside barbecue, where they feast on some amazing pork and chicken cooked al fresco.

programme.title: Nadiyas Time to Eat

programme.title: Nadiyas Time to Eat

programme.title: Nadiyas Time to Eat

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by top TV chef Monica Galetti. Theyre in Oxford, where Monica discovers the delights of an organic local distiller. James takes a river trip to a fantastic pick your own farm where he picks some raspberries and he uses them to cook a delicious pudding on the banks of the river. James also visits one of the worlds best chefs, Raymond Blanc, at his restaurant Le Manoir aux QuatSaisons, where he enjoys some of Raymonds Michelin-starred dishes.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is in South Wales, accompanied by Michelin-starred chef Stephen Terry. James discovers award-winning Welsh wine and cooks a Welsh lamb ragu on a beautiful mountainside. He samples the delights of organic Welsh chocolate and visits cooking legend Shaun Hill at his renowned restaurant The Walnut Tree. The day comes to an end at Barry Island, where James and Stephen enjoy all the fairground rides at this famous resort and James cooks Barry Island churros overlooking the beach.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: `The Great British Bake Off makes its debut on Channel 4 as the series returns for an eighth season with 12 budding bakers competing to be crowned the champion. Established judge Paul Hollywood is joined by food connoisseur Prue Leith, while seasoned entertainers Sandi Toksvig and Noel Fielding take on the role of being the shows hosts. Despite the change in personnel, the key Bake Off traditions remain intact, as the contestants try to impress the panel with a fine selection of beautifully-crafted and delicious cakes, tarts, breads and more.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.sub-title: Four Murders and a Death Sentence

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential

programme.desc: When Anna has an eye transplant, her lover Roland sees her in a different light.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A frightened embezzler (Steven Hill) stages his own suicide with the help of his double-crossing girlfriend (Joanna Moore).

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: Everythings coming up roses for newlyweds (Patrick ONeal, Kathie Brown) using the garden as a graveyard for blackmailers.

programme.title: Hitchcock on Grierson
programme.desc: Legendary film director Alfred Hitchcock pays tribute to `father of the documentary John Grierson, exploring what made his work so extraordinary and influential.

programme.title: Stuart Sutcliffe: The Lost Beatle
programme.desc: Musician Stuart Sutcliffe dies of a a cerebral haemorrhage shortly after leaving the Beatles.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.sub-title: A Girl Cant Always Have Everything

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: Hounds of War
programme.desc: A mercenary seeks revenge after his entire team gets wiped out during a final mission.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, princess of the Amazons, is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: Charming the Hearts of Men
programme.desc: A sophisticated woman returns to her Southern hometown and discovers her options are limited yet discrimination is plentiful. With the help of a congressional ally, she inspires legislation that allows opportunities never before afforded to women.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Aisha
programme.desc: Caught in limbo for years in Irelands immigration system, a young Nigerian woman develops a friendship with an employee who she meets at one of the accommodation centres.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: The story of the back-channel negotiations between the development of the 1990s Oslo Peace Accords between Israel and the Palestinian Liberation Organization.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome to M Night Shyamalans 2024 blockbuster `Trap.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielbergs 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielbergs 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Bold, Black and British
programme.desc: A powerful collection spotlighting the best Black British actors on the silver screen, featuring standout performances in `Wicked, `The Independent, `Aisha and `The Killer.

programme.title: Lake George

programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Outside influences affect the way the worlds first thinking, feeling robot lives and behaves.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgment by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Outside influences affect the way the worlds first thinking, feeling robot lives and behaves.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporations locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgment by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owners payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Its been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Lauries ready for him.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.
